pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===============Cognet===============.. image:: https://zenodo.org/badge/388924904.svg :target: https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/388924904.. image:: http://zed.uchicago.edu/logo/cognet_logo.png :height: 300px :scale: 25% :alt: cognet logo :align: center.. class:: no-web no-pdf:Info: Draft link will be posted here:Author: ZeD@UChicago <zed.uchicago.edu>:Description: Application of quasinets (https://pypi.org/project/quasinet/) for analysis of emergent structures in survey responses with application in adversarial contexts. :Documentation: https://zeroknowledgediscovery.github.io/cognet/**Usage:**.. code-block:: from cognet.cognet import cognet as cg from cognet.dataFormatter import dataFormatter from cognet.model import model data = dataFormatter(samples=GSSDATA, test_size=0.5)
